data.what_is: Brandwise automatically hides brand-damaging, hateful, racist comments and spam from your social media posts and ads.
data.product_description: Brandwise automatically hides brand-damaging, hateful, racist comments and spam from your social media posts and ads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Magnet For Database Management and Customer Engagement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brandwise?
It allows me to optimize campaigns in real time as a digital marketing executive and key insight of my campaign audience

What do you dislike about Brandwise?
The UI can be improved since we want our audience to remain engaged throughout the campaign, not lose interest just because of the creative.

What problems is Brandwise solving and how is that benefiting you?
With it, I can update the audience in real time on the campaign so that I can improve the productivity of the campaign

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brandwise?
The best thing we love about Brandwise is- it is a comprehensive platform for B2B sellers. The set of tools and features are very helpful to conduct business online.

What do you dislike about Brandwise?
Nothing as of now. The platform is working best for our client's business.

What problems is Brandwise solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have range of products for selling. And this platform offers all the necessary marketing tools for our day to day business.
